text.name: sys_description
text.text: Java Platform, Micro Edition or Java ME is a computing platform for the development and deployment of portable code for embedded and mobile devices (microcontrollers, mobile phones, personal digital assistants, TV decoders, etc.). Java ME was previously known as Java 2 Platform, Micro Edition or J2ME. As of December 22, 2006, the Java ME source code is licensed under the GNU General Public License and released as the phoneME project. It allows, among other things, to develop multi-platform games.
